title: चंद्रकांता संतति 1
description: Written by Babu Devkinandan Khatri, Chandrakanta Santati is the sequel to his earlier popular novel Chandrakanta. Its popularity in the nineteenth century led to hundreds of thousands of people to learn Hindi.It follows the adventures of Chandrakanta's sons Kuanr Indrajeet Singh and Anand Singh. Many of the characters from Chandrakanta (the first novel) still play an important part in the story.
author: Babu Devakinandan Khatri
